# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_triggers/godherja/GH_magic_spell_trigger_list.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

####################################
# LIST OF GENERATED SPELL TRIGGERS #
####################################

 spell_trigger_0 = { always = yes }	# GH TODO: Remove this from the binary list
 spell_trigger_1 = {	# spell_trigger_adult
	is_adult = yes
 }
 spell_trigger_2 = {	# spell_trigger_female
	is_female = yes
 }
 spell_trigger_3 = {	# spell_trigger_has_trait_wounded
	has_trait = wounded
 }
 spell_trigger_4 = {	# spell_trigger_has_trait_pregnant
	has_trait = pregnant
 }
 spell_trigger_5 = {	# spell_trigger_not_has_trait_magic_good
	NOT = { has_trait = magic_good }
 }
 spell_trigger_6 = {	# spell_trigger_traveling
	exists = current_travel_plan
 }
 spell_trigger_7 = {	# spell_trigger_forest_terrain
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = current_travel_plan }
		current_travel_plan.current_location = { terrain = forest }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { exists = location }
		location = { terrain = forest }
	}
	trigger_else = {
		always = no
	}

 }
 spell_trigger_8 = {	# spell_trigger_geographical_region_sarradon
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = current_travel_plan }
		current_travel_plan.current_location = { geographical_region = world_sarradon }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { exists = location }
		location = { geographical_region = world_sarradon }
	}
	trigger_else = {
		always = no
	}

 }
 spell_trigger_9 = {	# spell_trigger_childbirth
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:mother
			exists = scope:child
		}
		this = scope:mother
	}
	trigger_else = { always = no }

 }
 spell_trigger_10 = {	# spell_trigger_not_caster
	NOT = { is_in_list = caster_list }
 }
 spell_trigger_11 = {	# spell_trigger_is_inspired
	exists = inspiration
 }
 spell_trigger_12 = {	# spell_trigger_intimate_relation_to_caster
	OR = {
		any_spouse = {
			this = scope:caster
		}
		has_relation_lover = scope:caster
		has_relation_soulmate = scope:caster
	}

 }
 spell_trigger_13 = {	# spell_trigger_not_has_character_modifier_shard_exhaustion_modifier
	NOT = { has_character_modifier = shard_exhaustion_modifier }
 }
 spell_trigger_14 = {	# spell_trigger_not_has_character_modifier_magic_mind_fog_modifier
	NOT = { has_character_modifier = magic_mind_fog_modifier }
 }
 spell_trigger_15 = {	# spell_trigger_spell_organizer_is_title_holder
	holder = { is_in_list = spell_organizer_list }
 }
 spell_trigger_16 = {	# spell_trigger_slay_dangerous_beast_or_character_in_duel
	exists = scope:melee_success
	scope:animal_slayer ?= this

 }
 spell_trigger_17 = {	# spell_trigger_not_has_maxed_out_gh_ritual_tattoos_track
	has_trait_xp = {
		trait = gh_ritual_tattoos
		value < 100
	}

 }
 spell_trigger_18 = {	# spell_trigger_not_has_tattoo_of_ritual
	custom_description = {
		text = "Already has a #BOL tattoo#! of this [ritual]"
		OR = {
			NOT = { has_variable_list = GH_ritual_tattoo_list }
			NOT = {
				is_target_in_variable_list = {
					name = GH_ritual_tattoo_list
					target = scope:spell_being_casted
				}
			}
		}
	}

 }
 spell_trigger_19 = {	# spell_trigger_less_than_age
	age <= var:age
 }
 spell_trigger_20 = {	# spell_trigger_greater_than_age
	age >= var:age
 }
 spell_trigger_21 = {}
 spell_trigger_22 = {}
 spell_trigger_23 = {}
 spell_trigger_24 = {}
